to Become a Party

Assigned Commissioner's and Administrative Law Judge's Scoping Memo and Ruling. The preliminary categorization of this proceeding as quasi-legislative and preliminary determination that hearings will not be needed are confirmed.  The scope of this proceeding and the issues to be addressed are as set forth in the body of this ruling.  Michael R. Peevey is the assigned Commissioner and Presiding Officer for this proceeding.  Pursuant to Rule 8.2(a), ex parte communications will be allowed in this quasi-legislative proceeding without restriction or reporting requirements. Opening comments on Attachment 1 to this ruling shall be filed and served by August 24, 2012, with reply comments due by September 7, 2012.
